creator: eko@lanet.lv
text:
If defined variable contains non-Latin characters, SSI generates an error when a
script is executed as an include:

<!--#set var="virsraksts" value="Glāžšķūņa rūķīši" -->
<!--#include virtual="/scripts/my_script.cgi" -->

Generates a page with an message:

[an error occurred while processing this directive] 

The same directives without non-Latin letters in the variable generates a page
as expected.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13029 ***
